data.actual_result: We see the "You're being rate limited." message, but we also se additional information, most likely used for debugging.
data.expected_result: We expect it to tell us: "You're being rate limited."
data.short_description: Display Debug Information whilst making a Discord Account.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to:  canary . discordapp . com and make sure you're not signed in. - Hit the "Open Discord in your Browser" button. - Create an account, then when a new window pops up to sign in the user, close it. - Go back to canary . discordapp . com and make sure you're still signed out. - Try creating a new account using the "Open Discord in your Browser" feature.
